alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nez Perce and Lewis Counties through 400 PM PDT... At 309 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Winchester, or 18 miles south of Lapwai, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kamiah, Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, Mohler and Waha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
